short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developer Tool to inspect your Bildr Website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension for the Developer Tools of your browser will provide easy access to all the variables used in your/any website build with Bildr.
It takes away the need to type JavaScript in the console to see the variable values but instead provides a tab panel in the elements tab on which the variable values are shown.
By inspecting any element via the right mouse menu you can see all the variable values for that element or the (root) page its on.
